summary: Dragon Priest Masks with mage-related enchantment sets as cloth so they works great with Mage Armor Perk
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b]Description:[/b][/color]

This mod changes only mage-related masks into "cloth" so Mages can use them with Mage armor perk. There is no reason to change also melee or ranged related masks into cloth, like other mods does.

The changed masks are: Morokei, Nahkriin, Vokun, and wooden mask even if it's not a mage mask it has only a quest purpose.
I have also decreased weight for those masks and removed the temper recipe.

There is also an optional plugin for Dragonborn Masks, a feature that other mods haven't. I have also unleveled Miraak mask.

English and Italian versions are available.



[color=yellow][b]Compatibilty:[/b][/color]

Everything i guess.


[color=yellow][b]My other mods:[/b][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3271584/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check all of them here[/url]
author: nedellis
